entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
